name: part_003
file: tmp_【#宝鐘マリン生誕LIVE2023】3rd Generation Girls Band !!!!【ホロライブ⧸宝鐘マリン】 [AqEqeiqskEI]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'God knows...' in a classroom setting.
MC section in the classroom after the performance. The band decides to take their music to the streets.
The band meets up on a street corner in their 'casual' (original) outfits for a street performance.

subtitles.original: あふれだす想いも
subtitles.english: Even these overflowing feelings

subtitles.original: すべてを 美しき夢だけを
subtitles.english: Everything, only the beautiful dream

subtitles.original: 描きながら 追いかけよう for your lonely heart
subtitles.english: As I draw it, let's chase it for your lonely heart

subtitles.original: やめて 嘘はあなたらしくないよ
subtitles.english: Stop it, lies aren't like you

subtitles.original: 目を見て これからのことを話そう
subtitles.english: Look into my eyes, let's talk about the future

subtitles.original: 私 覚悟してる
subtitles.english: I'm prepared

subtitles.original: 暗い未来だって 強くなって
subtitles.english: Even if it's a dark future, I'll become stronger

subtitles.original: 運命変えられるかもね my wish
subtitles.english: Maybe I can change destiny, my wish

subtitles.original: かなえたいのに 全ては...
subtitles.english: I want it to come true, but everything is...

subtitles.original: あなたがいて
subtitles.english: Because you are here

subtitles.original: 私がいて
subtitles.english: Because I am here

subtitles.original: 他の人は 消えてしまった
subtitles.english: Everyone else has disappeared

subtitles.original: 淡い夢の 美しさを
subtitles.english: The beauty of a faint dream

subtitles.original: 描きながら
subtitles.english: As I draw it

subtitles.original: 傷跡 なぞる
subtitles.english: I trace the scars

subtitles.original: だから 私 付いていくよ
subtitles.english: So, I will follow you

subtitles.original: どんな辛い 世界の闇の中でも
subtitles.english: No matter how painful it is in the darkness of the world

subtitles.original: きっと あなたは輝いて
subtitles.english: Surely, you will shine

subtitles.original: 超える未来の果て
subtitles.english: Beyond the end of the future

subtitles.original: 弱さゆえに 魂こわされるように
subtitles.english: As if my soul is being broken due to weakness

subtitles.original: my way 重なるよ
subtitles.english: My ways overlap

subtitles.original: いま 二人に God bless...
subtitles.english: Now, for the two of us, God bless...

subtitles.original: 文化祭終わったねー！
subtitles.english: The culture festival is over!

subtitles.original: 終わったー！最高だったー！
subtitles.english: It's over! It was the best!

subtitles.original: ねぇみんな、あのさ、今度はさ、もう学校なんて狭い箱は飛び出さない？
subtitles.english: Hey everyone, listen, next time, why don't we jump out of this small box called school?

subtitles.original: おっ？どうしたの？どこ行っちゃうの？
subtitles.english: Oh? What's up? Where are we going?

subtitles.original: 路上に行こう、路上に！
subtitles.english: Let's go to the streets, the streets!

subtitles.original: じゃあみんな、次は私服で集合ね！
subtitles.english: Then everyone, let's meet in our casual clothes next!

subtitles.original: またねー！バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: See you! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 準備しとくペコら！パイセン！
subtitles.english: I'll get ready-peko! Senpai!

subtitles.original: あーお待たせー！
subtitles.english: Ah, sorry for the wait!

subtitles.original: お疲れー！
subtitles.english: Good job!

subtitles.original: 今日、頑張ろう！
subtitles.english: Let's do our best today!

subtitles.original: 頑張ろうー！
subtitles.english: Let's do our best!

subtitles.original: こいつ、私服がこれってマジか？
subtitles.english: Is she serious that this is her casual clothes?

subtitles.original: 大丈夫？痛くない？やる？やる？やる？
subtitles.english: Are you okay? Does it hurt? Shall we do it? Shall we? Shall we?

subtitles.original: やるやる！やろっか！
subtitles.english: Let's do it! Let's do it!

subtitles.original: 頑張ろうね！
subtitles.english: Let's do our best!

subtitles.original: 頑張ろうー！
subtitles.english: Let's do our best!

subtitles.original:
Pretender
作詞・作曲：藤原 聡
subtitles.english:
Pretender
Lyrics/Composition: Satoshi Fujihara

subtitles.original: 君とのラブストーリー それは予想通り
subtitles.english: The love story with you, it's just as expected

subtitles.original: いざ始まれば ひとり芝居だ
subtitles.english: Once it starts, it's a one-man show

subtitles.original: ずっとそばにいたって 結局ただの観客だ
subtitles.english: Even if I'm always by your side, in the end, I'm just a spectator

subtitles.original: 感情のないアイム・ソーリー それはいつも通り
subtitles.english: A soulless "I'm sorry", it's just like usual

subtitles.original: 慣れてしまえば 悪くはないけど
subtitles.english: If I get used to it, it's not so bad, but...

subtitles.original: 君とのロマンスは人生柄 続きはしないことを
subtitles.english: The romance with you, given my life, I knew it wouldn't continue...

subtitles.original: 知った
subtitles.english: ...I knew that

subtitles.original: もっと違う設定で
subtitles.english: With a different setting

subtitles.original: もっと違う関係で
subtitles.english: With a different relationship
